ThingDef.label: Royal honeycomb
ThingDef.description: This is a honeycomb produced by Royal bees. A prestigious and rare species, the Royal Bee produces a valuable substance known as Royal Insect Jelly, prized for its rich nutrients and health-enhancing properties. Honeycombs can be procesed in a Honey Extractor to get tasty honey, heavy beeswax and royal insect jelly.
